name: Dr. Kaelen Voss
reasonForDisplacement: Assigned to investigate anomalous FizzCo radiation signatures detected beneath the Strip.
personality: Cold, clinical, fascinated by cross-timeline biology.
questHooks: Requests samples from Divide storm anomalies.
Seeks to capture a rogue synth displaced into Zion.
Wants access to Vault 77 logs for cross-reality genetic drift research.
